title: Chapter 1980 - Chapter 1980: A Change, The Great Emperor Enters
body:
Chapter 1980 - Chapter 1980: A Change, The Great Emperor Enters

Chapter 1980: A change, the great emperor enters

Translator: 549690339

Xing Chen controlled the celestial Thearch’s physical body and punched Lu Ming.

“Slash!”

Lu Ming muttered and the celestial Thearch’s sword slashed out again.

There was another terrifying boom, and the celestial Emperor’s sword and physical body were both pushed back.

What they didn’t know was that at this moment, a shocking change was happening in the Lotus World.

The moment the celestial Thearch’s corporeal body rose, an invisible force rippled out and spread to the other eight worlds.

Roar! Roar!

At this moment, some of the most ancient ruins in the eight worlds let out earth-shaking roars.

The divine time Island of the myriad sea realm let out a heaven-shaking roar as the power of time swept through the heavens.

At the bottom of the underground cave in the myriad Beast Realm, the roars were even more shocking.

Some people were still taking the risk, but they were directly injured or killed by the power of the roar.

It was the same in other worlds. It was as if a Supreme demon was about to be born.

Outside the Lotus World, below the heavenly Emperor mountain.

From all directions, a dense crowd had gathered.

Of course, most of them were below absolute Saint, but there were also a lot of powerhouses above Martial Emperor.

There were even a few figures standing at the highest point, surrounded by divine light. It was a shocking sight.

They were the great emperors.

Everyone was waiting quietly.

The people who had entered the world of the lotus flower had been here for quite some time. They did not know what kind of opportunities they had obtained. Many people were very envious, but at the same time, they were also looking forward to it.

BOOM!

At this moment, the cave in the Lotus World suddenly burst out with a powerful light that shot out of the clouds.

But then, the light disappeared and the entire cave became dark. Even the projection of the Lotus in the sky disappeared.

“The Lotus world’s isolation power has disappeared!”

A great emperor asked in bewilderment.

What?

The others were also greatly shocked.

The Lotus world’s isolation energy had disappeared. Did this not mean that those above the rank of martial Supreme could also enter?

Many of the Martial Emperor powerhouses ‘eyes shone with a burning light.

Roar! “Roar!”

However, at this moment, a terrifying howl came from the cave. It was as if a Supreme demon was roaring, but it also seemed like a Supreme demon was about to be born. It was too terrifying.

“What’s going on? What is this?”

“What exactly is in the world of the lotus flower? How could there be such a terrifying sound? did the people who entered earlier encounter these existences?”

Many people’s faces turned ugly.

The emperors ‘expressions were solemn.

the force of separation has indeed disappeared. Let’s go in and take a look!

This was the voice of Emperor notionless. As soon as he finished speaking, he took a step forward and rushed into the cave.

Then, the emperors from the Heng family, the he family, and the Daluo heaven sect all rushed into the cave.

Emperor formless and the other three appeared in the sky above the Lotus World as soon as they entered the cave.

Although there was a power in the Lotus World that wanted to draw them to one of the petals, the power of a great emperor was strong enough to resist this power and choose which petal they wanted to enter.

Emperor formless took a step forward and charged into one of the petals.

The other three great emperors also rushed into the different petals.

Outside, the true emperors and void emperors all revealed greedy looks.

This was the remains of the celestial Emperor. How could they not be tempted? even if there were terrifying roars coming from below, they would not retreat.

One figure after another rushed into the cave.

At this moment, a few figures flickered in the sky in the distance. Their speed was unbelievably fast as they rushed into the cave with the many martial sovereigns. No one could see the appearance of these figures clearly.

When these monarch-level experts entered, they also entered the different flower petals.

The world that Emperor formless had entered was the ten thousand seas realm that Lu Ming had first entered.

The moment he appeared in the myriad sea realm, he looked in the direction of the divine time Island.

Immediately after, the space split open, and he stepped in. In the next instant, the space outside the divine time Island split open, and Emperor formless’s figure appeared.

Roar!

A terrifying roar rang out from the divine time Island.

what powerful time power! There’s actually such a powerful creature sealed here. Could it be left behind by the celestial Emperor? ”

Emperor notionless murmured. His eyes were like stars, capable of seeing through everything as he gazed into the depths of divine light Island.

Nothing could be hidden from his eyes. He could see all the living beings at the foot of the time God mountain clearly.

Emperor formless’s expression changed.

alien race! This is the evil god race!

Emperor formless’s face darkened.”Since I’ve touched you, I’ll completely obliterate you!”

Just as he was about to make a move, he suddenly looked into the distance and shouted,” “Who’s there!”

Si la!

The space over there suddenly cracked open, and a few footsteps came out.

These figures were completely shrouded in the pitch-black demonic light, emitting a terrifying aura.

The aura of one of them was no weaker than Emperor notionless’S. He was a peak great emperor.

“Wuxiang, 1 haven’t seen you for many years. How have you been?”

The great emperor realm expert said.

“Demonic spirit and evil spirit, it’s you!”

Emperor formless’s cold voice rang out.

If there were other people here, they would definitely be very shocked.

This was because Mo Ling was the legendary Cult Master of the demon spirit cult. Many years ago, he was active near the heavenly Emperor City. He was a terrifying force that specialized in killing martial sovereigns or those with the potential to become a sovereign.

And the evil spirit was the evil spirit Cult Master.

Even though this person was not a great emperor, he was still an existence that stood at the peak of the true Emperor realm.

The Masters of these powerful evil forces had come here at the same time.

evil spirits, you guys go and destroy the seal. Old man Wu Xiang, leave him to me!

The demon spirit religion Master’s Voice rang out. His body moved, turning into a terrifying demonic light as he charged toward Emperor Wu Xiang.

you are indeed from the evil god clan. Don’t even think about letting the evil god clan out!

die! Emperor formless roared as his aura erupted. He struck out with his palm, sending a terrifying palm print towards evil Spirit’s group on the island.

“Wu Xiang, your opponent is me!”

Devil spirit religion’s master’s devil Qi soared into the sky, and his terrifying devil blade slashed out, splitting the sky in half and blocking Emperor formless’s palm print.

“Get lost!”

Emperor formless struck out with his palms in succession. The great Dao imbued his body, and each palm strike contained the power to destroy the world.

However, the devil spirit religion’s master was also a great emperor. He was in the same realm as Emperor formless, and his battle power was also terrifying. His demonic blade swept across, blocking Emperor formless.

BOOM! BOOM!

On the other side, evil Spirit’s group had successfully rushed into the time God mountain and shattered the remaining two ancient altars.

Roar!

let’s go! the huge figure at the foot of the time God mountain roared. His aura was violent and shocking, and it rushed out like a stormy wave.

The entire divine light Mountain exploded, sending rocks flying everywhere. Clang clang clang!

The massive figure struggled as the chains around its body collided with one another. The entire divine time Island was shaking violently..
